description:
Season Seven Match
RAIN DEGREY
Poison
HT: 5'9
WT: 124 lbs
Season record (0-1)
Lifetime record (0-1)
Ranked 11th
MELLANIE
The Cowgirl
HT: 5'9
WT: 155lbs
Season record (0-2)
Lifetime record (0-2)
Ranked 10th
This is the first Middle Match of the year. Ranked 10 vs Rank 11. With three matches between them, they both get their first test against a "similar" opponent.
Mellanie has two matches under her belt, both with great wrestlers. Did she learn what she needed to be competitive? This hot MILF loves wrestling and is eager to win her first match.
Rain comes in with just one match-up, but she was raised in a Hippy camp and is a touch crazed. This girl does not know what giving up means, she is 100% go.
Crazed vs experience and size. Which one will win, I wonder?
title: Rain "Poison" DeGrey
